title: Secret Warriors, Vol. 4: Last Ride of the Howling Commandos
description: The glory days of WWII are revisited as you are invited to the reunion of Steve Rogers, Nick Fury and the remaining members of the U.S.'s most elite Special Unit from the Greatest Generation! Find out why ComicBookRecources.com raves that Secret Warriors is "a surprisingly tense and engrossing black-ops story".Collecting: Secret Warriors 17-19, Siege: Secret Warriors
author: Jonathan Hickman
